issue.title: [R] Determine Arrow C++ library capabilities dynamically on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11884](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11884). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`configure.win` should determine Arrow C++ library capabilities dynamically like `configure` does.
